channel.title: Reference on WorkflowFM PEW
channel.description: Recent content in Reference on WorkflowFM PEW

item.title: Getting Started
item.description: WorkflowFM PEW is available as a library from Maven Central, so you can add it as a dependency in your project. For example, in sbt: 1libraryDependencies += "com.workflowfm" %% "pew" % "1.6.1" PEW is currently only available in Scala 2.12.12.
